# Security Policy

## Supported versions

| Version | Supported          |
| ------- | ------------------ |
| 1.3.1.1 | :heavy_check_mark: |
| 1.3.1   | :heavy_check_mark: |
| < 1.3.1 | :x:                |

## Reporting a vulnerability

For minor security flaws, please consider opening an issue. For more severe security flaws, please consider writing an email.
